title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No 451 of 2020),
heading: 1. This Scheme may be cited as the Student Grant (Amendment) (No.2)
text_raw:
1. This Scheme may be cited as the Student Grant (Amendment) (No.2) 

Scheme 2022.
text_norm: 1 scheme may cited student grant (amendment) (no.2) scheme 2022

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No 451 of 2020),
heading: 2. This Scheme shall come into operation on 13th December 2022.
text_raw: 2. This Scheme shall come into operation on 13th December 2022.

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No 451 of 2020),
heading: In this Scheme “Principal Scheme” means the Student Grant Scheme
text_raw:
3. 

In this Scheme “Principal Scheme” means the Student Grant Scheme 

2022 (S.I. No.118 of 2022).
text_norm: 3 scheme principal scheme mean student grant scheme 2022 (s.i no.118 2022)

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No 451 of 2020),
heading: 4. Article 27 of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting
text_raw:
4. Article 27 of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting 

subparagraph (2) for the following: 

“(2) The value of the special and standard rates of maintenance grant in 
respect of an approved course shall be in accordance with the annual 
rates specified by the Minister. The rates specified for the financial year 
are set out in Schedules 3 and 3A.”
text_norm: 4 article 27 principal scheme amended substituting subparagraph (2) following (2) value special standard rate maintenance grant respect approved course shall accordance annual rate specified minister rate specified financial year set schedule 3 3a

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No 451 of 2020),
heading: 5. The Principal Scheme is amended by inserting the following article
text_raw:
5. The Principal Scheme is amended by inserting the following article 

after Article 27 (5): 

“(6). The total value of the Maintenance Grant that would otherwise be 
payable to an applicant under this Article and Schedule 3 in respect of 
the period January to May 2023 shall be increased by the total amount 
specified in Schedule 3A. Payment of this additional amount shall be 
made on a pro rata basis in respect of an applicant’s attendance on an 
approved course in an approved institution during this period.”
text_norm: 5 principal scheme amended inserting following article article 27 (5) (6) total value maintenance grant would otherwise payable applicant article schedule 3 respect period january may 2023 shall increased total amount specified schedule 3a payment additional amount shall made pro rata basis respect applicant attendance approved course approved institution period

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No 451 of 2020),
heading: 7. Article 37 of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting
text_raw:
7. Article 37 of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting 

subparagraph (2) for the following: 

“(2) The awarding authority, or other relevant paying authority 
referred to in paragraph (1), shall pay maintenance grants in nine 
instalments, in line with the annual rates specified in Schedule 3 and 
the additional amounts specified in Schedule 3A.” 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [655] 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Scheme. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 December, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 December, 2022. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [655] 5
